Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-24786 affecting package cri-tools for versions less than 1.30.1-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-24786 affecting package cri-tools for versions less than 1.30.1-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.
